text:
Kaha se Suru karun Yugesh aapke saath to itni memories hai. Chalo kosis karta hun.

First day of college hum sabhi Hall 5 quad me wait kar rahe the Rooms ke liye tabhi aapki entry hoti hai aur aapko dekhte hi I was like ye to poster boy hai bhai Patna ka aur phir shaam me jab room me jaata hun to dekhta hun yhi banda mera roomie bhi hai bhai literally Triple Room ka gham compensate ho gaya tha. Abhi bhi yaad hai mujhe jab mera pehla phone aaya tha to aap kitne excited the. Mafia Nights se leke Late Night Oat sessions tak bhai kitni yaadein hai. Theatre me pehli movie (Murder on the Orient express) aapne hi dikhayi thi. Wo aapka Google Pay install karwanaðŸ˜‚. ESC101 ke exam din aapki Binary Trees ki class, TA201 exam ke liye saath me ratta maarna. Aapka hamesha motivate karte rehna. Mujpe aapka unconditional trust thanks bhai meant a lot to me. Bhai aapka facebook post jab mai Coordinator bana tha thank you yaar for your unconditional love and affection. Aapke Saath duniya daari ke debates karna. 

Ab jaldi se sum up karta hun warna 2-3 page likh dunga. Intellectual level pe to Kabhi nhi connect kar paya lekin emotional level pe hamesha connect kiya. Aapka hamesha honest suggestion dena whether ki wo accha lage ya kharab aur over the time wo hamesha hi sahi nikalte the. Hamesha aise hi suggestions dete rehna Yugesh. Aap aao na aao mai jarur aa jaunga Switzerland milne.

Bade bhai ki tarah hamesha motivate karne ke liye thanks Rommie.
author: Kevlin
